publ: by Gomathy Shankaran (DBA Kidz Learn Applications)
name: Mathpuzzlegame
0:
”Alexa, open Math puzzle game”
”ask me a question”
”repeat”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math puzzle game
Developer Terms of Use
des: "Math Puzzle game" has 15 questions related to word problems and puzzle solving in maths. The questions use different objects usually related to fall season, inside this puzzle. After a heavy feast or a game, you may want to hone your math skill. A question can be skipped by saying "next". While answering the question in the puzzle, one is required to always precede with the sentence "the answer is". "Happy Puzzling" as this math puzzle can be solved at any time or any other season apart from fall. This app also has a premium one time purchase.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
